definitions.definition: The fact or act of surviving ; continued existence or life.
examples: His survival in the open ocean was a miracle; he had fully expected to die.

definitions.definition: Of, relating to or aiding survival.
examples: His survival kit had all the things he needed in the wilderness.

definitions.definition: The avoidance of relegation or demotion to a lower league or division.
A custom or belief that persists in folklore from earlier times, when the rationale behind it is forgotten.

main_definition: The fact or act of surviving ; continued existence or life.
secondary_definitions: ( as a modifier ) Of, relating to or aiding survival.
( sports ) The avoidance of relegation or demotion to a lower league or division.
( anthropology ) A custom or belief that persists in folklore from earlier times, when the rationale behind it is forgotten.
